title: Meriah L. DeJoseph, PhD
text:
::: {.g-col-4 text-center} 

Meriah L. DeJoseph, PhD
NICHD Postdoctoral Fellow
Stanford Center on Early Childhood







Hi! I’m a developmental scientist focused on how children navigate the complexities of growing up in poverty — especially how those early experiences shape self-regulation and cognitive development. I use dynamic methods to inform both basic science and real-world applications.
Download my CV

:::
